com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl

Class BasicAbstractDrawable<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawable<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
  • Type Parameters:
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Scalar - The type that Pos's individual components consist of (- see VectUtil )
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable<Rend,Pos>, Element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAbstractLayout, DummyDrawable, ImageIcon, Slider

    public abstract class BasicAbstractDrawable<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable<Rend,Pos>
    The most basic base class for implementations of Drawable. Provides the default size behavior.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    Drawable, DefaultSizeBehavior

      protected DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar> sizeBehavior
      The object implementing the basic behavior pattern for sizes of Drawables.

      Property<Pos> _sizeConstraint()
      The size constraint that can be applied by the owner of the Drawable.
      abstract VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> getVectUtil()
      Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.

      The maximum size that the Drawable can attain.
      Property<Pos> minSize()
      The minimum size that the Drawable can attain.
      Property<Pos> prefSize()
      The preffered size that the Drawable will have if it is within the bounds of minSize and (maxSize,_sizeConstraint).

      The real size of the Drawable, which it takes when rendered on the screen.

        protected final DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>> sizeBehavior
        The object implementing the basic behavior pattern for sizes of Drawables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicAbstractDrawable

        public BasicAbstractDrawable(VectDecomposer<Pos,Scalar> decomp,
                             Pos max,
                             Pos min,
                             Pos pref)
        Constructs the Properties associated with the size behavior of this.
        Parameters:
        max - default value for maxSize Property
        min - default value for minSize Property
        pref - default value for prefSize Property
        decomp - Pos decomposer to initilize the DefaultSizeBehavior component

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public ReadonlyProperty<Pos> size()
        The real size of the Drawable, which it takes when rendered on the screen. Supposedly should be derived from the values of other present size parameters, therefore it cannot be modified directly.
        Specified by:
        size in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
        See Also:
        DefaultSizeBehavior

      • maxSize

        public Property<Pos> maxSize()
        The maximum size that the Drawable can attain. Should be strongly greater than or equal to minSize
        Specified by:
        maxSize in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>

      • minSize

        public Property<Pos> minSize()
        The minimum size that the Drawable can attain. Should be strongly lower than or equal to maxSize
        Specified by:
        minSize in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>

      • prefSize

        public Property<Pos> prefSize()
        The preffered size that the Drawable will have if it is within the bounds of minSize and (maxSize,_sizeConstraint).
        Specified by:
        prefSize in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>

      • _sizeConstraint

        public Property<Pos> _sizeConstraint()
        The size constraint that can be applied by the owner of the Drawable. Used eg. if the element is in a layout to regulate its size without affecting the maxSize defined by the user. If null, then no constraint is to be applied. Doesen't have shortcuts implemented for .get and .set to descourage BFU from using it.
        Specified by:
        _sizeConstraint in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
        See Also:
        UberElement, UberDrawable

      • getVectUtil

        public abstract VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> getVectUtil()
        Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.
        Specified by:
        getVectUtil in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
